name: Tossing & Rolling
description:
Tossing & Rolling places you in the fever dreams of a stressed out office worker, eager to enter the machine as a freshly extruded cog.

This was our first jam using a traditional Game Engine, and it definetely shows since most of it is unfinished. Still, there are a bunch of things we're proud of so we might as well post it!

Credits:

Suso: VFX, Programming & Pyjama Dude

Iris385: Writing,  Level Design & Art

Asometric: Level Design, Art & Programming

Resources Used:

Font: Munro by Ten by Twenty

Music: https://ctmmusicrepository.bandcamp.com (Shoutout to our friend Enshano he's the GOAT)
